choices.label: Can I hope to help my father, I who am left behind?
Will my father offer the hope of aid which is left to me?
Should I hope for the help of my father whom I myself abandoned?
Do I hope for reinforcements from my country which I left behind?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
